feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for regression in .12 with encoded html entities
  • v5.11.13 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10487

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.12...v5.11.13

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Patch for regression in column visibility check.
  • v5.11.14: by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10488

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.13...v5.11.14

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for emailing all contacts by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10489
  • Minor fix for settings prop check by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10491
  • react_release.yml improvements by @benbrummer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10475
  • Fixes for unicode characters in html by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10492

New Contributors

  • @benbrummer made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10475

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.14...v5.11.15

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.16
